ygData.subject: Re: And on a completely unrelated subjec
ygData.msgSnippet: Beggers are a giant pain..lol. there s nothing i enjoy more then putting togeather newbie packs for druids, warriors etc just a back pack full of misc items
ygData.messageBody:
Beggers are a giant pain..lol. there's nothing i
enjoy more then putting togeather newbie packs for
druids, warriors etc just a back pack full of misc items
they could use...i do find observing first helps other
wise you're constantly harrassed for more..i like to
pick the nice ones out that have a sense of compassion
and not greed, they are the ones who will pass the
items on when they outgrow them. Another thing that
irks me is the loudmouths that shout the first newbie
to do this or that gets what ever item that person
has to give away (not refering to shouts of no drop
items or items someone else has and is willing to let
others that need loot)...i don't consider ppl like that
generous i find them to be controling and narcistic ...the
ones that don't beg for items are the ones that will
hang back from taking handouts that require them to do
tricks for the benifactors amusement those are the ppl i
want to arm and clothe and have fighting next to
me..lol..i know they will be the ones more concerned with
helping kill the mob rather then on their knees looting
whilst someone else dies.<br> thats my two cp Happy
Hunting <br><br>Beechwoodgrey
